Summary: Apply for Leave with valid dates
Precondition: Employee has Leave balance and in Apply Leave page
Test description:
1. Select Leave type
2. Select valid range of dates
3. Leave Comments blank
4. Click Apply
Expected results: Application is submitted and appears in Leave request module for users with appropiate permissions

Summary: Apply for Leave with insufficient Leave balance
Precondition: Employee has Leave balance and in Apply Leave page
Test description:
1. Select Leave type
2. Select range of dates that exceed Leave balance
3. Leave Comments blank
4. Click Apply
Expected results:
- Validation message appears "Balance not sufficient" 
- Application is not submitted

Summary: Apply or Leave in past days
Precondition: Employee has Leave balance and in Apply Leave page
Test description:
1. Select Leave type
2. Select range of start and end dates that have already passed
3. Leave Comments blank
4. Click Apply
Expected results:
- Validation message prompts user to select valid dates
- Application is not submitted
Notes:
Request was submitted. See Hans Moleman with application dates 10/06/25 to 11/03/25.
Could be a feature (?)

Summary: Apply for Leave with overlapping dates
Precondition:
Employee has Leave balance and in Apply Leave page
Employee already has a pending Leave request
Test description:
1. Select Leave type
2. Select range of dates that overlap with a previously submitted and pending Leave request
3. Click Apply
Expected results:
- Validation message "Overlapping Leave requests found"
- Records of overlapping dates are shown to user

Precondition: Employee has an already existing Leave application and in My Leave page
Test description:
1. Select Leave request
2. Cancel Leave application

Summary: Balance refunded after Canceled approved and scheduled Leave
Precondition: Employee has an already approved Leave application and in My Leave page
Test description:
1. Select Leave request
2. Cancel scheduled Leave
Expected results: Scheduled leave application is canceled and days refunded

Precondition: User has required Leave approval permissions and is in Leave module
Test description:
1. Select Leave request
2. Approve leave request
Expected results: Leave application is approved and appears on Leave Schedule

Precondition: User has required Leave approval permissions and is in Leave module
Test description:
1. Select Leave request
2. Reject leave request
Expected results: Leave application is rejected and disappears from Leave requests

Sub-module: QT-3.3 Approve leaveLeave List and Filters
Precondition: User has required Leave approval permissions and is in Leave module
Test description:
1. Select Leave list
2. Write employee name in field
3. Click search
Expected results: All Leave records of employee are shown
Notes: Show Leave status is a required field therefore only filtered results for that employee can be shown instead of all Leave history. Could be a feature (?)

Precondition: User has required Leave approval permissions and is in Leave module
Test description:
1. Select Leave list
2. Filter list by a status
3. Click search
Expected results: Leave records within the specified criteria are shown
